description: Letter dated Nov 2009 from Jil Matheson (National Statistician) to James Clappison MP regarding the number of young people aged between 16 - 17 and 18 -24 years who were unemployed from 1992 to 2008 and what estimate has been made of the number of students looking for part-time or vacation work included in those figures. Incl. table. 4 p.
